subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson had an up-and-down second round at the Arnold Palmer Invitational, and moved to a stroke off the lead behind a group that included Ernie Els and Davis Love III.
snippet: Phil Mickelson had an up-and-down second round at the Arnold Palmer Invitational, and moved to a stroke off the lead behind a group that included Ernie Els and Davis Love III.
